name: Kuroi Mishin: Sekaikei Girl
storyline:
The end of time.
While the Great King of Terror rules the world, one woman stands up.
Will she save the world?
summary: Horror-themed homebrew platform game for the MSX, consisting of 42 screens with pattern-based enemies.
